name: 8004-solana-indexer
description: Custom Solana indexer for 8004 Agent Registry v0.4.0

scripts.test:e2e:major: DEVNET_RPC_URL=https://api.devnet.solana.com RPC_URL=https://api.devnet.solana.com WS_URL=wss://api.devnet.solana.com bunx vitest run --config vitest.e2e.config.ts tests/e2e/reorg-resilience.test.ts tests/e2e/devnet-verification.test.ts
scripts.test:e2e:coverage:major: DEVNET_RPC_URL=https://api.devnet.solana.com RPC_URL=https://api.devnet.solana.com WS_URL=wss://api.devnet.solana.com bunx vitest run --config vitest.e2e.config.ts --coverage tests/e2e/reorg-resilience.test.ts tests/e2e/devnet-verification.test.ts
scripts.test:mainnet:readiness:e2e:strict: REQUIRE_ONCHAIN_VERIFICATION=true DEVNET_RPC_URL=https://api.devnet.solana.com RPC_URL=https://api.devnet.solana.com WS_URL=wss://api.devnet.solana.com bunx vitest run --config vitest.e2e.config.ts tests/e2e/devnet-verification.test.ts
scripts.test:mainnet:readiness: bun run test:mainnet:readiness:unit && bun run test:mainnet:readiness:e2e
scripts.test:all: bunx vitest run --coverage && bunx vitest run --config vitest.e2e.config.ts
scripts.bench:vitest: bun scripts/benchmark-vitest-runtime.mjs -- run tests/unit/config.test.ts tests/unit/parser/types.test.ts tests/unit/logger.test.ts
scripts.bench:vitest:node: bun scripts/benchmark-vitest-runtime.mjs --runtime=node -- run tests/unit/config.test.ts tests/unit/parser/types.test.ts tests/unit/logger.test.ts
scripts.bench:vitest:bun: bun scripts/benchmark-vitest-runtime.mjs --runtime=bun -- run tests/unit/config.test.ts tests/unit/parser/types.test.ts tests/unit/logger.test.ts
scripts.bench:hashchain:massive: HASHCHAIN_SCALES=100000,500000,1000000 HASHCHAIN_ITERATIONS=1 HASHCHAIN_WARMUP=0 bunx tsx scripts/benchmark-hashchain.ts
scripts.bench:hashchain:retrieval:massive: HASHCHAIN_SCALES=100000,1000000,2000000 HASHCHAIN_ITERATIONS=1 HASHCHAIN_WARMUP=0 bunx tsx scripts/benchmark-hashchain-retrieval.ts
